text: @socialepfo @EPFONarimanPt @PIBHindi @PIB_India @MIB_India @MIB_Hindi @airnewsalerts @AIRNewsHindi @DDNewslive @PMOIndia @_DigitalIndia @DDNational I have applied for advance under outbreak of panademic of covid-19 at 30/03/2020 and it's still showing under process even after 14 days.
